name: Deno runtime
description: Installs the Deno runtime via the official release archives.

version.description: Version of Deno to install (semver or release tag).

installCompletions.description: Install shell completions for bash, zsh, and fish.

cacheDir.description: Directory containing cached Deno archives and SHA256SUMS for offline installs.

offline.description: Prevent network access; requires cacheDir assets and pre-installed unzip.
